'''Undine''' was a [[Netherese]] [[arcanist]] and [[spell]] inventor who lived during the [[Age of Discovery]].
document_data.History: The variator developed five spells during their life, all within a four-year period. The spells they invented were ''[[avoidance]]'' and ''[[hold portal]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2938|NY}}, ''[[rope trick]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2939|NY}}, ''[[phase door]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2940|NY}}, and finally, ''[[deeppockets]]'' in {{YearlinkConvert|2941|NY}}.
